description:
In summer, you can be found mountaineering and alpine climbing; in winter you enjoy ice climbing and ski touring. The same is true for the Taiss hard shell jacket. It offers an optimum balance of weight, robustness and a modern yet functional design – a real multi-talent.

It is made from the new Mammut DRYtechnology Pro 3-layer fabric that raises the bar in terms of breathability and weather protection. The material’s elasticated properties and the Mammut High Reach Technology™ allow you to move freely. An essential criterion for climbing and mountaineering.

If you work up a sweat, the 2-way zippers under the arms provide cooling ventilation. The two front pockets are compatible with a climbing harness and backpack, and offer lots of storage space when you’re out and about. Drawstrings allow you to adjust the hem width and stormproof, helmet-compatible hood ideally to your needs – even when wearing gloves.

Are you looking for a jacket you can count on for all your mountain adventures? Then the Taiss HS Hooded is the perfect choice.
name: Mammut Taiss HS Hooded Jacket - Mens
